name: KOL - Label - Mods (Aug 15th, 2010)
description:
Updated June 9th, 2010: Added another mod, made it less weird in tabbed chat.

(Mod) Wombaticus: Insert really bad but punny joke here.
Mod Announcement (Wombaticus): another pun-filled hint about not spoiling
Mod Warning (Wombaticus): somedork has been banned from chat (forever).

GM users: Do NOT use this site's Greasemonkey version, it clashes with other GM scripts from this site.
The KOL Forum Thread for this style (In Greasemonkey form) is here - http://forums.kingdomofloathing.com:8080/vb/showthread.php?t=140918

The (much better than this site's) Greasemonkey version of this style is here -
